name: Nanoeconomics INDEV
description: A very early build of my economic strategy-puzzle game. So far only has AI - ships fly between stations,  ferrying "WareType1" and "Waretype2" back and forth. There are 99 randomly generated sectors with 10 stations each. There are about 10k ships flying about at any moment.  Please report the performance on your system as well as your approximate specs. Mouse wheel to zoom in and out. Mouse over ship to display information about it. Avaiable for Windows and Linux.
